title: Albi the Racist Dragon
description: In the Marmalade Forest between the make believe trees, in a cottage cheese cottage lives Albi the racist dragon.
quote: I’m crying because all of those horrible people chased me into this scary cave. I think it’s because I’m so racist.
altHero: Albi, a sad felt dragon, sits outside a cave
alt1: villagers with torches and pitchforks surround Albi
alt3: a dirty felt Albanian boy holds a jelly bean that’s all the colors of the rainbow
alt4: Albi and the boy eat bubblegum pie
